author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin reference in Cutey Honey?
body:
In one of the intros for Shin Cutey Honey, they show her in a black outfit 
running away from spotlights the way Lupin runs away from spotlights in the 
pilot and intro of the first series. Does anyone know if they were making a 
reference to Lupin? Or was it just coincidence?
